comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I couldn't get enough patients, I couldn't get enough cash, and my staff energy seemed to drain way too fast. I love the surgery games but you maybe get one of those a day. I ended up uninstalling when room upgrades said they would take 12 hours. Too much waiting, not enough action. I liked the story so far too. Maybe I'll reinstall in the future if the times go down.

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

It's a nice game, I like the concept, you get to operate on patients and manage a hospital. Problem with the recruitment part, it was always giving me surgeons and wasted 200 hearts on the same person. There should be an option if you want to fire someone or replace with another staff. The biggest issue is with their connectivity, internet connection is very stable works with all apps except for this one, no idea why. Fix it please I would hate to delete this game. Thanks.

This game will cheat you! I  upgraded a bunch of my characters but the next time I logged in nothing had saved! The funds I used to upgrade were also gone, of course. Don't waste money buying anything because the upgrades you make just disappear.

Let your app data be backed up... My old phone has to be replaced and after a lot of work everything was still not saved. I feel this is a pretty simple thing to have included and a dumb thing to leave out. Fail. Thanks for taking my money and running.
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristics🚑  Play the most realistic surgery simulations🚑  Build your own hospital🚑  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives🚑  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department🚑  Dive into two captivating seasons 🚑  Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

comments: Would like more customisation options for my character. This game keeps crashing for no reason and doesn't like to reward it's loyal users. It is a fun game if they just let you play it. Fun game, but the gold farming and inattentiveness to what the users want will ruin it. Great game, lots of potential if taken in the right direction, but WAY to glitchy.
Like most other games, there is too much effort to bait you into micro transactions. The older games were so much better. It's a shame the Devs have resorted to such money grabbing standards.
would love to play this game. and will change my review but after i make a team i enter my name on shirt and it just stays there and can not proceed. first three levels seemed awesome

Kinda annoying game. Teammates won't go after the ball and watching ads sometimes doesn't let you try again.                 Season 3 level 76 is impossible I pass to my guy and he doesn't bother to move a finger.

I like the tactic aspect of it, pretty good time waster. Took me a while to beat it, but didn't have to spend a dollar to do it. The story itself is very unrealistic and after 15 seasons I completely stopped following it and focused only on the games.

Physics are stupid. You pass a high ball to your teammate. A good accurate pass. And the defender wins the header bc your teammate doesn't event jump for the header. Annoying. Also the goalie makes literally humanly impossible saves at times. He can take one step only and move across the goal and block your shot. This game needs real life human physics
description: BE THE HERO! Pass, Shoot & Score your way to legendary status, as you explore the dramatic career of your HERO player over 580 challenging levels!Immersive free flowing 3D Score! Gameplay lets you control the action. Split defences with precise through balls, or bend shots into the top corner, putting you in control for an unrivalled mobile soccer experience.Download and play today for FREE!* Includes tablet support! ******************************************FEATURES* Over 580 levels and counting…* Win awards, win trophies, score goals, change clubs, represent your country and go for glory!* New Score! comments: The original sonic dash is better imo. had a better atmosphere, maps looks better gameplay also better. the original was a masterpiece. also, I don't like that they introduce scenes that requires you to tilt your phone. since i played sonic dash i didn't expect it to be there. it's annoying when you're laying down and play the game and you got that scene just ruins the gameplay.

The responsiveness of the controls I  this game make it unplayable... it's slightly more responsive than the original sonic dash but it's still no where near good enough for such a fast paced game.  I tested this on other devices before I posted this review and it's the same on all of them

Way too many advertisements. I actually downloaded this game because subway surfer makes start over everytime you download it but after my next tech upgrade I'm going back to that, atleast the game not flooded with ads.

I would give it 5 stars, I made an in app purchase to remove ads, but after the game updated non Sega ads started showing again and it asked me to make another purchase in order to remove the non Sega ads AGAIN... love the game, hate the ads...

TOO MANY ADS!! Decent game but ruined by an add every 20s. Sonic forces doesn't have half as many adds as this game but isn't as good so looks like Sega have fallen short trying to add more pounds to their fortunes and made the game unplayable.

Ads are back. I paid for a red ring bundle, which did remove them for a while, but they're back. The only reason I made a real purchase was so that I wouldn't have ads, so can someone please remove the ads from my account. On another note, I really like this, and nice to see Shadow playable again.

comments: Been playing since goblins vs gnomes (2014) and still play today. Not a diehard player, but as my buddy put it, "hearthstone is the best toilet game ever". It's pretty simple and easy to learn. Newer and f2p players have a bit of a rough go, but you can easily keep pace in this game for less than $100 a year.

I love card games and this got some awesome elements. However... The randomness and luck in this game is pure bs. You can be in a winning position and still lose because of 1 in a 10000000 chance of the oponent getting lucky. Even when I win I feel bad from winning because I know the oponet was unlucky.... It is very rare I get a game where I think. This game was awesome because we both did our best.

I never even got to play. I have now tried to install 3x. The first two times the app became unresponsive. The third it caused my phone to crash and reboot. I have a pixel which should be perfectly capable of running it. If not then don't offer it for this device. First blizzard product that's ever pissed me off.

Great game! Love all the really cool animations! I do have a problem that since I installed the game, my store has been closed 😐 I am installing it on PC right now to see if I can get to the store there. Game play is awesome though!

Really fun game. 3 stars cause it closes very easily. If I get a phone call even when I dont answer the game closes.even on wifi it closes. Then it takes too long to reload causing me to lose a turn. This is the worst in arena because losing one turn will kill you and it becomes a waste of gold. Please do whatever you can to solve this problem.

Fun for a game or two here or there, other people seem to just roll out super powerful cards and wipe you out super fast. Too much of a frustrating game since NOT wanting to pull credit card out .....might be uninstalling it here soon.
description: DECEPTIVELY SIMPLE.  INSANELY FUN.Pick up your cards and throw down the gauntlet! In Hearthstone, you play the hero in a fast-paced, whimsical card game of cunning strategy.  In minutes, you’ll be unleashing powerful cards to sling spells, summon minions, and seize control of an ever-shifting battlefield.  Whether it’s your first card game or you’re an experienced pro, the depth and charm of Hearthstone will draw you in. JUMP RIGHT IN: Fun introductory missions bring you into the world of Hearthstone’s intuitive gameplay. BUILD YOUR DECK:  With hundreds of additional cards to win and craft - your collection grows with you.HONE YOUR SKILLS:  Play in practice matches against computer-controlled heroes of the Warcraft universe.  Thrall, Uther, Gul’dan - they’re all here! COLLECTION TRAVELS WITH YOU: Your card collection is linked to your Battle.net account - enabling you to switch your play between tablet and desktop with ease.  AND FIGHT FOR GLORY:  When you’re ready, step into the Arena and duel other players for the chance to win awesome prizes!Post feedback about the game in our forums: http://us.battle.net/hearthstone/en/forum/13619661/Hearthstone requires at least 2GB of installed space on your device. description: One of the best fun games for downtime, Carry Over the Hill!Carry Over the Hill is the most addictive of all fun games! Once in a while we need to rest our brains from information and problems, so why not try luck with a building game? Put your fingers to work with our top fun app, and kill some time while you are waiting. Show your creativity, basic physics knowledge and try to end this awesome puzzle game. There are many construction games out there, and no doubt, they are all fun but Carry Over the Hill will challenge you, annoy you, and if you get anywhere, you will get the feeling of accomplishment. Building games are getting more and more popular these days because they don’t require effort, but they make you easily hooked. We made sure that our fun app can satisfy everyone from 7-77 (or nowadays 2-102), and everyone who loves construction games will find this to be a perfect fit. Furthermore, it is also a physics game, based on driving and constructing, so you can put your skills to the test. If you enjoy building things, this is a perfect building game! You can build single wheeled, two wheeled, three wheeled vehicles, or maybe a tank? With this fun app you have 4 in one, building game, construction game, physics game, and puzzle game. The last part is especially important for parents who need a distraction for their kids while they are busy, what better than a fun game. Our puzzle game will keep your kids entertained as long as you need. There is no violence, guns, or any aggressive moments, so the puzzle game is absolutely safe for your kids. It will even challenge them to think, work with their logic, and progress in logical thinking. However, this fun game is not made only for kids, it is a perfect construction game for everyone, regardless the age. The very goal of this fun game is to carry all your fruits to the end of the road as fast as you can. So the speed of the game will test your motoric skills. Beautiful and colorful design will satisfy the eye, and the simple physics game plot of the building game makes it even more addictive.Give our physics game a chance and let us know how you did. We make fun games in a bid to satisfy the gaming community, and if you feel that something is missing, or have an idea on how to make it better, feel free to get in touch and share your thoughts. If our construction game has a glitch or a bug, please don’t let it slide, let us know the details so we can work through it. After all, we all making fun games because of you, so let’s make them even better together!

comments: Its a pretty good game, the animals look nice, but you should definitely add more if them, like tigers, lions and bears (see what i did there?) And add their appropriate habitats. Another thing i saw was all the juveniles are called cubs. This, i think, should be changed. Wolves have pups, foxes have kits, and lynxes have cubs. There should also ve more diversity and variety in the prey department. Such as bison or elk. Over all i really like the game.

I Absoulutely love the update! Each design is so unique! I was wondering, will there be mythical animals as legendarys or, as rare. For example The Aura Wolf, an elemental wolf with feathered wings. If you think my idea is silly, I understand! Also, this game is so smooth and fun! It's a must play! I play it everytime I am stressed or need some fun. Anyway I hope you like my idea, if not it's tottal fine! Keep up on the good work and awesome games! Best of Luck for the future!

Too many adds to be great. No videos available in the coin menu, yet constant adds popping up? Zero logic there. If you space the adds at least 15 minutes apart, then a player might be able to focus on an objective in the game. Every 3-5 minutes is stupid. Can't even play long enough to see if I like the game because the adds. Graphics are nice.

I love it all the other animal games were never as good as this one I love how we can have more than two cubs and we can switch between animals. So I rate it 5 stars 😸 love the game and I would recommend it. But the one problem is that it is so hard to get acorns can you make another way to get acorns . Oh and can you add more animals like tiger🐅.

This is one of the best animal rpg games I've ever played. The only thing I'm confused about is how to get a pup. Both of my wolves are above level 10. The female is level 12 and the male is level 11. I made them fall asleep in the den, but I'm not getting a pup. Could you explain this to me? I'll enjoy the game a lot more if you do.

This is the best game I have ever played and ever will play. I recommend it to everyone. Even if it doesn't look good to you get it its awsome. I think or know you will like it. Also it's so cute and the graphics are awsome. Also everything is priced so well. I love how you add new stuff often. Also you can level up fast, and let go of your purse into a new family. BEST GAME EVER!!!!!,

description: Join more than 30 million brainiacs and try WordBrain - Brain training at its BEST! This is a word puzzle for true word geniuses! It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. Exercise your brain and find hidden words, slide your finger over them, and see the letters collapse. Do it all in the correct order and you will be able to clear the grid. As you get stuck on a level, which you probably will, remember that there are no unsolvable levels. So think carefully before each swipe and conquer the ultimate word challenge while keeping your brain in shape! WordBrain is available in 15 languages with 700 levels per language, so even the smartest word game enthusiasts will have a real challenge to complete this game. In fact, only very few have!---WordBrain has been lovingly created by MAG Interactive, where we take fun seriously.Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like Ruzzle,Wordalot or WordBrain 2!We really value your feedback, go to https://www.facebook.com/wordbraingame and say what's on your mind!More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.comGood Times!

Update: Game was fixed very fast and is my favorite game. Everyone should download and play this game. It's simply amazing with great graphics!!! Only thing is why can't we have a woman character? I'm a woman in real life and want to play one online too!!! When are you all going to add women characters???

Graphics are good an Gun play is pretty fair. When battling the game goes on runs where I get matched against teams whos members are way stronger then my team an I. Then it goes back to fair match making.   3 Month UPDATE: The game has turned into a money grab. You have no chance to compete against players that drop a bunch of money an have 4 an 5 star guns. This was the top shooting game in my opinion, but turning it into a pay to compete killed the fun with this game. Havent been match fairly against players in a couple weeks now. I would recommend trying a different p vs p shooting game.

Amazing game, however there is one small problem, but not enough for me to not give it 5 stars. Recently when I've been watching an ad to double the reward at the end of the battle, the video has played until the end and it says the reward has been doubled, but I only receive the regular reward? It has happened 15-20 times and it's getting slightly annoying, as I'm about 4000 gunbucks short of what I should be now. Anyways, thanks for making such an awesome free game with little to no adverts!  UPDATE: video watching for additional rewards does not work with anything. No extra crates or supplies

Initially the game seems super addictive but once you hit level 16 it gets ridiculous. You have players who have spent money on guns and you're practically no match. Also the teaming of players should be balanced out. Another thing is even if you win a match you win around 30 trophies, if you lose there's a loss of 60 and if by chance you're internet is bad and you automatically get kicked out and cannot reenter you lose a 100 .Eventually you get sick and tired of all this and the game gets boring.

I think it's a fun game with some mechanics. One thing I don't lime is the fact that the guns seem to switch itself out I to a different weapon of a type I dont need out of nowhere. Which I hope can be patched and fixed soon. And the in app purchases are very affordable. Love the game but please fix the controls and make them more fluid.
description: ✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! • Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/
developerAddress: Antakalnio st. 17, LT-10312, Vilnius, Lithuania
recentChanges: Try the new 60-120 FPS high-end gaming experience and our full-fledged eSports Spectator mode!
HIGH-END GRAPHICS
- Frame Rate settings — enjoy the smoothest gameplay ever at 60 FPS on most devices and 120 FPS on Razer Phone
SPECTATOR GALORE
- New Spectator mode — use 3rd person and top-down cameras to freely switch between players during matches
- Restrict Spectating in Private Matches to prevent stream sniping
- AR Spectator for Android is finally here!
BALANCE UPDATE
- Rebalanced 6 guns
summary: Explosive FPS with super easy controls and non-stop PvP action!
title: Guns of Boom - Online Shooter

comments: Overall, the game is pretty cool. But, I feel much more can be added though. Great game. Just more needs to be added. It's a great app I wish the devs could make like, Sandbox modes where you can build your own... Em... Coasters? I dunno. You had to verify them first. Annnd in order to verify them you had to complete them yourself. Then you could publish them. And maybe a two player mode? Not sure how that's gonna work out. That's all that could be added. Most of all. 3 and a half out of 5 stars.

The only way to play online is Facebook and Google play! First, you can make a 3rd option for an in-game name, like in Clash Of Clans,  and make the Google play account optional if you don't want to download Google play (not meaning that Google play is bad). Many people can not even think of any name that is not already taken in Google play (including me). It still is a good game,just it needs some more work.

Don't get me wrong, it's amazing and seems to be fun, but there's one thing that ruins it all. Whenever I open the game, everything shifts to the right quite a bit, so I can't see about one fifth of the screen, which doesn't allow me to use the button control setup, and some other things. Would love to see this get fixed, as the game has some nice potential.

Love this game for the cool clip art graphics with all the chaos. Relly funny when they crash. Lol i just dont like the constant ads gou have to watcg when ever you have to open a prize chest and when you win. I mean you win and then you gotta watch a clip for 30 secs, then it feels like you lose. Lol

Its a fun game where you actually get rewarded for watching ads. Multiplayer is a little laggy but its a fun game over all. Only thing i would like to see is the aftermath after your character either dies or falls out of the vehicle (level automatically resets after about a second after you die). Maybe even move around like you can in happy wheels, even if its just in single player mode. But overall a good game.

So glitchy!!! Why?!?! I'm glad I didn't spend any money on this game because I'm already uninstalling due to how glitchy it is. It's very annoying and hard to play because of it. I'll try again in a month. Hopefully the devs take this seriously and work on fixing it or they won't have any players left!

description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

20097 Hamburg
Germany

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesome😒 Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

The game is good. There are problems though. D-muscle is absolutely useless. It's the worst car in the muscle set and has no business being the fourth car in that set. The final upgrades for the fourth car on all sets are far too expensive. It requires an insane amount of grinding to unlock the last cars. The prices of supercharged upgrades are all over the place. Why do all of Haulinator's cost 100 coins while Dune It Up's cost 1000-2000?

Game would be good if the dev's took time to work out the huge amount of bugs. Everytime I run this, I get 3 races deep then everything stops responding. Running it on Samsung Galaxy S9+ with perfect cell service. All the buttons click but do nothing. Uninstalled.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

My 2 almost 3 year old and I really like this game. It's pretty fun BUT it seems to freeze up after a few races and I have to shut the game off and restart it to play more. This obviously frustrates little man and I'm sure I'm not the only one this has happened to. Other than that, we think it's a great game.

Good graphics. If you fail and do exact same again you may pass level if you level up car, you end up failing sooner and have to slow down but after trying 7 r 8 times gets annoying and the level up car is worse than your basic car. Too frustrating so deleting

comments: Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

People have low requirements nowadays. This game doesn't deserve a 4.4 rating. It feels good as long as I stay in the menu (even with the weird japanese mascot) but once the game loads it gets horrible. The camera angles are terrible, the cars feel like toys in the overscaled world, the car's softshadow is terribly aligned and the physics simulation is just mediocre. The whole game is just a mediocre clone of Asphalt 8, I don't understand why people choose an inferior copy instead of the original one...

So many ad's, there back to back ad's. When I am finally able to select a race, guess what...another ad pops up and takes me to the play store to download it. I go back to the game and I gotta start all over again from the first screen. Ad's ad's ad's I was only able to play on the first day I downloaded it, after that..... Ad's ad's ad's                    "AD'S!!!".... But i did like the game when I played it

It's good. But could you please add an "are you sure you want to finish repair dialog box?" I have wasted too many diamonds. You can even make it option (from the settings) for those who wouldn't like it.

Good time waster. Especially well made in the beginning levels, but quickly becomes pay to win, as diamonds are not easily attainable and neither are coins, not to mention that later cars are very high prices and require much dedication to acquire. Controls are nice, but like with money, get worse with time. Maps are not optimized for later leveled cars, making some corners physically impossible to make even when drifting at full tilt, forcing the player to adapt to a combination of drifting, boosting and then braking to get around a bend without crashing. Otherwise, it is a very nice game for being free, although there are many ads, but that's excusable as it is a free game. I would recommend it, just not as a long term type of game.

descriptionHTML:
Be a super agent and conduct a comprehensive investigation of the case. Many useful clues have been found and it's time for you come out with the whole truth. All the evidence proves that he is the criminal. Collect all evidence and bring the bad guys to justice. It's time to arrest him. Let's go!

Features:
1. OMG. Alan is coming here. He sneaked up on Eric and tried to destroy the evidence. Can he be any worse?
2. Was high school boy Eric injured in the fight? Give Him a head-to-toe health check.
3. Be a super agent and conduct a comprehensive investigation of the case.
4.Great. Many useful clues have been found. Mermaid Princess Mia scratched the kidnapper's arm when she struggled with him. Do the blood test to find the truth.
5. Collect all evidence and bring the bad guys to justice.
6. All the evidence proves that he is the criminal. It's time to arrest him. Let's go!
7. The bad days are over. The mystery kidnapper had been arrested and princess mermaid Mia can breathe again.
8. Good News. Your crush high school boy Eric asks you to hang out. Will he confess his feeling to you? So Excited about it!
9. Oh, no. The gossip girl Lily has just eavesdropped two sweethearts. She couldn't wait to share the gossip with her good friend Kim.
10. Kim is just spoiled and arrogant. How can she accept a boy she likes to date with other girl?


ABOUT US
JoyPlus creates fresh mobile content for the whole family. we lovingly produce digital adventures that entertain, challenge, and engage families all over the world. Find us on Apple's iOS and Google's Andriod operation system!

comments: A very fun game that is both simple and a bit challenging because you have to make literal split-second taps to get it to work properly. The only downside is that it's a very short game. There are only two places to colonize and once you've done them and reached level 10 on both, there's really nothing left to do. It would be nice if they added more levels to colonize or some other form of continuation.

Good game, played it over a long period here and there and I've basically completed it.  Would love to see more planets! And bigger challenges, as currently every time I go on it my little explorers are making over 1.5 million a day and I've got no where to take my space funding! Haha   Great game imo, just needs more features, planets, asteroids maybe. :) Good job.

Be cool if there is boosts. Example if you get 3 perfect you get a free auto perfect boost or something. Also plz add a line of code to stop people from the date/time bug abuse - save current time to file. Player won't get money till that last input time has passed.  Also be cool to spend the coins on boosts

Very cool and challenging. 20 seconds game that has taken several hours. Graphics are amazing and victory audio also. Needs lot's more planets and more ships, only 2 planets is a shame. Speed and other gages would be nice. A flag in each planet. Ads didn't bother me that much. 5 stars for the team

It's a fun game, just need more planets to jump to and more rocket skins. The colony is just a bunch of people standing on the planet. When I think of colony, I think of buildings and sustaining life and such. Would be nice to see the 'colony' grow bigger each time you rank up. (Example, more buildings etc.) Also, a choice of a button to press when detaching the rocket and different rocket shapes to choose from. Thank you

Before the update it was quick to grind lots of cash but still it took some time. With my current build, I was reaching 10k+ averaging Greats and Awesomes but now after the update I barely scratch 8K! You guys nerfd the fuccc out the rocket power!!! NEW PLAYERS DON'T EVEN BOTHER WITH THIS! IT WILL TAKE YOU A VERY, VERY, VERY LONG TIME TO GRIND!!!
description: Blast off for the stratosphere with Space frontier, the addictive physics rocket game that your friends will want to play, but they can’t! It’s your phone, mate.Your mission is to launch your rocket as high into orbit as possible. Simple touches control when you release each stage in your rocket. Earn in-game currency from successful launches and spend it to acquire new parts and styles.Easy to play but hard to master gameplay means you’ll be coming back again and again for one more boost.
descriptionHTML:
Blast off for the stratosphere with Space frontier, the addictive physics rocket game that your friends will want to play, but they can’t! It’s your phone, mate.

Your mission is to launch your rocket as high into orbit as possible. Simple touches control when you release each stage in your rocket. Earn in-game currency from successful launches and spend it to acquire new parts and styles.

Easy to play but hard to master gameplay means you’ll be coming back again and again for one more boost.

comments: Awesome fighting game so far! The latest update on chapter 4 and loads of new weapons are so far the best! Still few tweaks are needed here and there, but in general... The best fight game by far!!! Great work by dev! Much better than previous shadow fights!
Unfair battles...the CPUs always win. Fix that dam glitch and you will get 5 stars from me.  Updated comment: The CPU read your every moves and you never tried to fix it. So game deleted
After updated !Game is restarting again and again nothing works !Sometimes it shows fatal error and numerous times it show your data may be lost ?what the hell  😏
I had my epic chest finally ready to open. But I duel in arena first. When it's over, I'm unable to open the chest. I restarted the game, and my epic chest is gone... what the heck?
projectiles don't have penalty cooldown time for a counter so they just spam it and the throwing/slamming perk is impossible to dodge
The new update has some issues, after a fight the screen goes small..pls fix this. Thanks
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

recentChanges: In this update we bring to you the long-awaited Chapter 4!
It features:
- 15 new main quests, based on your previous choice
- Ranged weapons! 36 types of them, including harpoons, arbalests, shurikens and more!
- New bosses (depending on your Chapter 3 decision)
- Dozens of new side quests
- 12 new equipment sets
- New locations
- New shadow abilities

description: Doctor Hippy likes to cure animals! Her ambulance is always ready for a call, where surgeon or vet are needed. All best games for boys and girls where player could find hospital, games, where you need to save, cure and help, all of them are collected to the series of games Game Doctor Surgeon Hippo. If you like kind games about hospital and interesting games about doctor, then a new exciting game Doctor surgeon Hippo is created especially for you.To cure animals is as interesting and exciting as to cure people. Hospital is a big and interesting place. Games about hospital and games about doctors teach us different important knowledge and skills. Hospital simulator allows to learn how to make vaccination safely, to make operations and save patients, who need urgent and complicated operations. Surgery is a very responsible and complicated task. Doctor surgeon learns in a medical school and visits hospital as an intern for a long period of time, before he could make operations. But our Hospital simulator allows to skip many years of studying and try to make vaccinations right now. Try to save patients and make safe operations right now! And if you like it, you could go to study in a medical school. And after studying you could cure people in real life!Doctor Hippo surgeon needs help! Without your help, Hippo ambulance can't cure the animals of Hippo town. We need a vet urgently. Be a part of our team, now you are a surgeon doctor! All games for boys and girls from the series Game Doctor Surgeon and games Hospital of Hippo town are absolutely for free.

description: Are you ready for an adventure? Blaze & Monster Machines for free. blaze Race the Skytrak it's a very cool car race game and kids i hope u will love it.Play the latest games with Blaze Monster Machines for free. Try this new Blaze Race the Skytrak game in which you will have by your side your friends from the Blaze and AJ. The name of this fun game is Race the Skytrack and is a fun creative and adventure game in which we invite you to join us and your favorite characters and have some fun. You will have to help Blaze get the chopper back, but in order to be able to chase it and grab it, you will have to transform his Monster Machine into aerodynamic race car. You will start by creating the car, modifying it into a race car , fast enough to catch the chopper and bring it back to the helicopter. You will be the one controlling it and making sure you avoid all the obstacles that get into your way. We are eager to see how you will react to this new and fun adventure game that we have decided to offer to you next today. Enjoy this new adventure game with your friends from Blaze & Monster Machines and have a lot of fun.

comments: Why I liked it? Because it's a simple game that doesn't make you addicted to phone but rather enjoy going forward focusing your attention entirely on your finger. What comes to music as I read in comments, I always play games without music so haven't listened to this game's. I play this game as a reward after working hard and I'm entirely satisfied. There have been no crashes so far. Lots of ads, though.

I mean the game in itself is......alright  it could be a lot better.  I think the controls are rubbish and I understand it's meant to be "skillfull" but thats harder than skillfull, you can't even see where the circle is, this also adds to the game being bad. Having said all this you have also added rubbish music..... like you could have put something decent on. I get even more of an urge to uninstall the game every time I play it. Overall I definitely do NOT recommend this game. Game developers I hope you read this as it will probably help you to make the game better. I understand it would take a while but I don't care. If any of the game developers want to feedback on my feedback you are welcome to.Thank you.
It's a good game but... it's annoying cuz I keep falling because where the dot is I have to put my finger over it to move so I can't see where I am going.
This is game is ok if you are bored and don't know what to do.... however it becomes irritating after playing for a while.... overall its a nice game
I would like to report a bug. When you pause the game, moving obstacles keep moving. Someone would use this as a cheat
It is a great and fun game. Challenging and it works on your patience and timing. However it deleted all my progress for some reason and I lost all of the obstacles I unlocked, which was a lot

comments: Purchasing the other ponies is worth it. Don't know why other people are complaining. It's only 5 dollars, you could get a DQ lunch for 5 dollars. Anyways, game is amazing. What's cool is that you can reset your progress so you can have fun all over again. Amazing work Budge Studios!

This game is my 5 yr olds favorite thing to do during trips. She loves the music and animation, and the gameplay is entertaining enough to keep her engaged. It's definitely worth the few bucks to get the add free version.

Installed it, launched it, after the bungie screen was presented by a full screen ad for some game involving a woman + handcuffs + panties. Not a good look for a game aimed at children, my 6 year old was standing behind me.

Why advertise the game as "free" when it really isn't?  You can only get so far with the "free ponies" before you hit a pay wall that requires parents to purchase additional ponies to finish the quest.  The reason I say "free ponies" is that your child is subjected to a ridiculous amount of ads in order to play. The only way to get rid of the ads is to buy the ponies.  Even though my daughter loves the game and it's easy for a 5 year old to play, I had to uninstall it due to the ad content.  You really should be more careful who you solicit ads from for content designed for children under 8.
Ads popped up every 45 seconds. I timed it. Made the game useless for my son (4). And he really wanted to play it too.

My daughter loves this game so much! Good job guys. However we need your help, i made a purchase to unlock all ponies, however, somehow they got locked again and we needed to purchase again to unlock everyone. It was kinda disappointing, please help us on this matter.

comments: Really enjoy playing this game so addictive. I currently play it on a samsung galaxy phone and I'm over 400 levels played. I am  going to be changing phones over to iphone and wondered if I could download game and carry on where I left off, or would I have to start all over again? Hope not.

I was a devoted player to Blast solitaire but this game has it beat. I love the challenge games as well as the journey to getting more gardens. Wish there were ways to get free wildcards? I hate paying that six grand for a help card. But I am addicted and I highly recommend it!

Love the game but I think the bonus levels to unlock gold crops should be heaps cheaper to play. Some of them are hard and you run out of money to keep trying them as they cost as much as a normal level to play.

It looks good and the gameplay is fun. Unfortunately that fun only lasts so long before the game devolves into micro transaction hell. Each round gets so expensive that I can only play one or two unless I were to buy coin packs. These guys should be ashamed.

Really fun game but costs too many credits to play and the extra five cards and wild are over priced considering the cost of credits per game round. Could be better if these issues get resolved I would edit my review to five stars all around.
It is a fun game. BUT, the levels cost so many coins that it's very slow. Unless you plan to pay real money or can win every level 1st try, expect to play maybe 1 game an hour.

comments: tbh it's a really good app! The only problem is that it gets a little boaring after a while (obviously that's my opinion) And I don't know if it's just me but there or tons of over 30 second ads.

I think there is to many ads like u have to watch a ad after u die. And then if u wanna continue u have to watch ANOTHER ad. Its just so annoying. But other wise I love this game. It keeps me entertained while I am bored or when I am on the bus on my way to school. But there are way to many ads and I hope u guys please fix that. 💜
I like this game  very much cause you dont know what comes in front of you which makes this game more interesting. But 1 problem is there that the second i crash to any obstacle an add popups

This game is the WORST!!! The controls don't work and there is not even demonstration on how to play. Also every time I retried to do it a stupid add came up. I AM FURIUS!!!! Do you expect me to have patience with this game? I hope not because I have no patience and this game totally pushed me to the limit and put me off playing on my tablet. If you do not want to be annoyed please don't get this app and if you do delete it straight away in my opinion. ( I don't mean to be rude but this game makes me very angry.) THE END!!!!!!!!!

This game is AWFUL!! There is no tutorial and every time I fail an unimportant ad comes up. What is wrong with you making games like this? Close this game down it is terrible. Just learn. Who would want to play a game like this you stupid idiot

It's honestly a fun game, and I'd love to use it as a stimulating activity (ah, who am I kidding, it's just a great time killer), but it makes my head hurt-- and that's a problem. I'm not even the type of person that is negatively affected by fast-paced graphics or rapidly changing colors. It'd be five stars if it didn't give me headaches, but, for now, it gets three; good graphics, smooth gameplay, but no matter how great the app, it isn't worth physical discomfort. (Note: if you are looking for something similar, try "Run". It has the same sort of concept, but without the advertisements and headaches.)

comments: Great game, me and the family enjoy it immensely and we have all made our contribution, thank you. The controls in card battles on the phone are too fiddly, considering there is a lot of unused space on the screen: this would have been developed differently if it wasn't attempting to mimic the desktop version. Lazy! Is the ".. playing over WiFi..." warning still relevant? Unlimited mobile data and 4g means many of us have as good a connection as fixed line. Love the game, thank you.

This is an awesome game I play it be very day and I had two games I would always play now I don't even play them at all because this game is so awesome and I kinda play it to much.  But I did get my last account deleted for some reason I was mad and couldn't get it back so I had to create a new one

Everytime I play a club arena game (free every 24hours) it will keep telling me i disconnected from the game while my Internet connection is fine. But when I play other normal arena games, it turns out fine. I find it very annoying because i have to wait 24 hours to play my favourite club games and it always disconnects, and it makes me mad. I hope you notice this comment and leave a reply... Please fix this... Thanks :(  Edit: It works fine now, thank you! :)

Very fun game, my most played game by far but the major issue in this game is hackers. You get good and start to play the end gamers and realize 90% of them are bots with millions of coins and as soon as the game starts you are sent balloons to your side that cannot be activated until round 15+! It's frustrating to earn my coins legit just to have them taken by all the hackers and bots. Ruins the game when makers aren't doing anything about it.
I LIKE IT BUT IT WOULD BE WAY BETTER IF U ADD MORE MONKEYS AN IF THE BATTLE THAT U PAY 100 TO GET 200 MEDALIONS WONT GO AWAY NUT STILL COOL PLZ ADD MORE STUFF LIKE MONLEYS

description: Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates.Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses. Check out these awesome features! * Head-to-head two player Bloons TD * 27 custom Battles tracks * 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades * Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent * Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time * Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode * Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends * 16 cool achievements to claim * Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list. The choice of strategy is yours - hunker down for the long game, or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? Jump into a game of Bloons TD Battles now! REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTIONPERMISSIONS: Bloons TD Battles requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage to buffer video ads. Video ads help fund the production of our free games, so we appreciate your understanding and support. descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates.

Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!

Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses.

Check out these awesome features!
* Head-to-head two player Bloons TD
* 27 custom Battles tracks
* 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades
* Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent
* Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses
* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.
* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent
* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time
* Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode
* Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends
* 16 cool achievements to claim
* Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp

If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list.

The choice of strategy is yours - hunker down for the long game, or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? Jump into a game of Bloons TD Battles now!

REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTION

PERMISSIONS: Bloons TD Battles requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage to buffer video ads. Video ads help fund the production of our free games, so we appreciate your understanding and support. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

description: Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra,  Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two. Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.Special Features:-Take pictures and video of your poses.-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.-Difficulty Modes: Beginner Yoga, Easy Yoga, Medium Yoga. Hard Yoga poses.-Weight Loss Goals: Encourages a healthy lifestyle, physical exercise and breathing techniques.-Yoga Friend/Family Party: You can play this with one and two player modes.-60+ Yoga physical exercise poses.-Can share your yoga challenge videos and photos.-Artistic hand drawn poses.-Unlock avatars and backgrounds.Please ,leave a review and feedback on what you love about that app and what we can improve :)

comments: I had to do this for a Tapjoy thing and I spent ALL DAY trying to get past stages. They are way too difficult before 100, that shouldn't be. Normally, I tough it out with offers but this one is not worth it even if it's 200 points. This game is UPSETTING

Over engineered upgrades which are clearly done as a gold mine for DroidHen. Result is you either pay to win or massive grind. Defender II was more balenced in this regard but still a huge grind too. I think World Raid is a myth since it has never worked. It apperently lasts about 30 second but I don't know since it mostly throws an error. I've gotten in twice and it immediately goes to Stage Cleared with >97% beast life left.

Bug that you have to wait endlessly to enter daily raid seems to be partially fixed. But: 1. Raid is even more fraudulent than before...no mattet you defense, dragon will one hit you. Fraud, there is no reason for a mechanic you cannot do anything about except exploitation! 2. I have all the upgrades and do pretty much max dmg, but there seem to be people out there that do 20 times the amount I do...except they don't, because they simply DO NOT EXIST!!! AS IN BATTLE MODE THEY ARE SIMPLY MADE UP BY THE DEVS! THEY ARE NOT ACTUALLY REAL PLAYERS!!! 3. The skill that decreases % of all dmg does not do so...it virtually does not reduce damage at all, but still it costs 50 crystals per % point. Also fraud! 4. You pay for somethin but you cannot keep it. If you change your phone, everything is lost forever! This is criminal behaviour! CONCLUSION: Probably the most fraudulent and criminal organisation out there. BEWARE AND DO NOT INSTALL, AND FOR CHRISTS SAKE, DON'T SPEND MONEY ON IT!!!
Great game. Was able to transfer data when I upgraded my phone. Simply and easy. Just sync with a FB account and load saved. Great time killer. Just need a better method for material farming
Great time killer.  Love the game play.
It didn't give me my epic bow it promised to give me when I downloaded it.

description: Welcome to the factory business, where you can gain maximum profits on the backs of your hard-working employees!Oh... I meant congratulations! You are now a factory owner! It's time to Make More!• 💰 Manage - Hire, fire & train your workforce to maximize profits• 🏭 Expand - Build and upgrade factories and make crazy new products• 🎁 Boost progress - Frequent Surprise Gifts increase productivity• 💢 Events - Boss rage, workers quitting etc.  bring variety to factory life• 🏆 Achieve - Get the trophies and finish tasks to make the BIG BOSS happy• 🤡 Collect - Hire silly workers like Mr. Master and Splurf. Can you spot the pop culture references?• ⭐Prestige - Restart with better workers & bonusesMake More is one of the most loved clicker games. It is a crazy work simulator that makes YOU work to get your factories to run and to make idle profits.Every factory you build has its own different character. Circus Factory makes sweet cakes and lollipops! Farm Factory produces farm stuff like cows. And poop.Surprise gift boxes will boost your productivity: You'll make a fortune a lot faster when the boss gets his cup of coffee! And see your workers go wild with some motivational disco music! There is only one direction to follow: MAKE MORE!You can play Make More! for free, but it contains optional in-app purchases. Please see your device's settings if you want to disable in-app purchases completely.!!Warning!! HIGHLY ADDICTIVE CONTENT! Once you start playing Make More!, you can't put it away!We'd appreciate if you'd report any issues you're having with the game to support@fingersoft.net, please include your device make and model.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the factory business, where you can gain maximum profits on the backs of your hard-working employees!

Oh... I meant congratulations! You are now a factory owner! It's time to Make More!

• 💰 Manage - Hire, fire & train your workforce to maximize profits
• 🏭 Expand - Build and upgrade factories and make crazy new products
• 🎁 Boost progress - Frequent Surprise Gifts increase productivity
• 💢 Events - Boss rage, workers quitting etc. bring variety to factory life
• 🏆 Achieve - Get the trophies and finish tasks to make the BIG BOSS happy
• 🤡 Collect - Hire silly workers like Mr. Master and Splurf. Can you spot the pop culture references?
• ⭐Prestige - Restart with better workers & bonuses

Make More is one of the most loved clicker games. It is a crazy work simulator that makes YOU work to get your factories to run and to make idle profits.

Every factory you build has its own different character. Circus Factory makes sweet cakes and lollipops! Farm Factory produces farm stuff like cows. And poop.

Surprise gift boxes will boost your productivity: You'll make a fortune a lot faster when the boss gets his cup of coffee! And see your workers go wild with some motivational disco music! There is only one direction to follow: MAKE MORE!

You can play Make More! for free, but it contains optional in-app purchases. Please see your device's settings if you want to disable in-app purchases completely.

!!Warning!! HIGHLY ADDICTIVE CONTENT! Once you start playing Make More!, you can't put it away!

We'd appreciate if you'd report any issues you're having with the game to support@fingersoft.net, please include your device make and model.

comments: Overall, I love it but it would be helpful if we could get something like a monthly subscription. Maybe like 10-15 characters fragments plus 10-15 gems or something. It would help us be less grindy. It would help with collection and able to get legendary easier plus monthly revenue. I would love that. Compare to MFF which is a lot more hectic, you guys a bit more generous. Just please don't put any paywall characters. Hated that.

Fun game but currency is insanely expensive. I don't mind spending money but this game is ridiculous. So instead of me spending a little I spend nothing. I guess my wallet thanks you. It's also so hard to level people up... They keep introducing new characters I have to level up to keep up with alliance missions. Those are fun but I want to level up my other characters too!

It was a great game until they introduced Deathstroke. Now you either need to have him(I do but it takes the fun away) or have people specifically to counter him. They made him way OP and arnt nerfing him anytime soon. So if your just starting you will want to spend money to counter death stroke.

Upgrade superman please, he is so weak.. i  have Lvl 52 Superman with Lvl 7 gear but his overall is still lower than Lvl 50 Cyborg, Power Girl or even Jessica Cruz with Lvl 4 gear. He is the weakest energy character even though i invest a lot on him.

I've been looking for a good DC game.. This is it and beyond! Great roster of characters.. I really like the combat system.. The combat animations are spot on.. It may load slow sometimes but it's worth the wait.. Great game for RPG and DC fans.. Even if you are not a fan, I still recommend this game.. Injoy

It just won't work. I used to play a long time ago.. Wanted to resume my progress. I downloaded it and the main screen came up. When I select a menu option the screen goes black and stays like that. Do something about please

comments: I just bought the level 4 crates. Some were delivered, then it reverted to level 3. I have a screen shot showing that I already had level 4. I cannot find a bug report feature in this game. Please fix this in my account. Otherwise, I love the game. Remember to buy something to fix the ads.  Edit: I sent customer support an email with a screen shot a month ago. There has been no response.  Edit: EVERYTHING I BOUGHT IN THIS GAME IS GONE!!

Endless merging without any real goal while being spammed with ads and offers to spend $$. App was boring and pointless but thought maybe it would get better, but within first 30 min playing started being unresponsive to taps and lagging so uninstalled. Don't waste your time.
Way way too many ads. If I chose "watch ad to upgrade for free" then fine - But when I open my inventory/upgrades and I'm faced with an ad almost every time. That's just annoying and wrong.

Paid three dollars to remove ads, still need ads for most aspects of the game. Then found yet another micro transaction to gain higher level crates otherwise you're doomed to play the ever slow way. This game isn't worth it. It's just a micro transaction haven.

Unable to play the game at all first time opening the app I get the welcome message but I'm unable to press the next button it's completely unresponsive. The app doesn't crash just unresponsive. Any advice on this issue would be appreciated. Really looked forward to this game. I'm using a Samsung Galaxy 7 Edge.

The game was a good time waster for a couple days but then just started bugging out. I couldn't tap anything no matter how hard I tried and I needed to restart my phone every time I played the game. Just uninstalled it after getting very frustrated. Would be better if it actually worked.
description: Ever wanted to be Mayor? Ever wanted to run a town, develop the land, and see a metropolis grow? Well, look no further than Merge Town!, the newest title from Gram Games. The concept of the game is simple - you have a plot of land, and it’s your job to turn it into a town. Every so often, you’ll be gifted with a house. Each house can be merged with other houses of the same variety to form a bigger home. Every house built on the land will earn you money - the bigger the home, the more you will earn. The more you earn, the more houses you can purchase, and the more you can push the clock to develop faster. Use your spoils to discover new homes, and to expand into all new towns.You have a singular goal: make your towns the best they can be. The bar at the top of the screen measures development - Merge buildings to earn XP and level up. Higher levels will unlock more space in your plot for you to develop, which will only allow you to develop your town to even further greatness. Once you develop into new towns, keep an eye on all your land, ensuring that you’re merging and developing to your full potential.Merge, build, and develop your very own towns with Merge Town!

comments: So slow of a game will take you hours just to establish Just the basic upgrades.... go bored waiting for the world's slowest shop to move to next island fishing dear God that's just draining your battery to watch a clip art fish bite a clip art hook   Ugh has potential but as it stands its a bad game

This game activitly makes me angry. I want to keep playing it but the longer I play the less accurate my ship becomes, eventually missing EVERY SHOT, EVERY TIME. It feels likes the longer you play the game the less effect your ship becomes. It's a fun game but seems like a pretty intense cash grab.

Decent, not good. Enemy flags might as well not exist as they don't fight eachother. You'll end up getting swarmed by every ship that always go faster than you, no matter how much you upgrade speed. They ram You constantly dealing damage but then take no damage from when you ram them. They also aren't affected by friendly fire. You can't actually aim and the constant ads are very annoying.

Easy to play game. Good graphics. Controls can be a bit fiddly, but not that hard to deal with. If playing solidly for a while (30+ minutes), the cannon firing timing stops working properly and all shots miss (except for the enemies!) - restart the game and problem resolves, but a frustrating little bug.

Game is fun. Good for time killing. But the cannons seem having a serious accurate issue after played like 20 mins or so. Longer you played, the aiming will being more off to the shooting targets. It doesn't sound right to a game play design.

This game is amazing. Hands down one of the best games I've ever played on mobile. Also, you don't need to spend any money! I got to a fully maxed out ships without spending a cent. One thing you guys should add is multiplayer and different style ships, maybe Viking or something. Otherwise great game.

recentChanges: TONS OF FUN!
Airport City's residents are preparing to celebrate St. Patrick's Day!

Holy moly! Have you seen the dancing leprechauns all around the city? Catch them, assemble the collection and get an awesome bonus: a Pot of Gold! It'll increase your commercial buildings' profitability.

Collect Clover for good luck and send flights to Ireland; really get into the festival spirit and have loads of fun! Become good friends with Lady Luck and the unique Leprechaun Museum building will be yours!

comments: A wonderful survival game that Ive been enjoying nonstop for around a week. I personally have not experienced slow loading, and the rare items to find are fun for me, not too hard. The controls are great and graphics a+. (they also keep adding new fun stuff that makes the game fun to play for even experienced players) great game 😀

This is not actually a review its more like tips for those who like to play the game. I started playing on December and I already have a chopper. I could easily build a second one. The alpha bunker is the best place to get parts. Try using the traveller and selecting 5% chance to find a car part before you open the treasure boxes. Keep the best weapons for the  bunker.  Spots that appear on the main map that have timers are the only places you will find your body incase you die out there. If this is helpful I will give more tips on clothings.

I really like the game. It's fun and addicting, with patience.  My only complaint is that everytime i die,  which is often,  i lose all my stuff and can never find my body again.  I can't build most of what I'm able because I'm still trying to gather from the first levels.  I die instantly at every aggressive player I encounter.  Maybe there is a trick to finding my stuff that I don't know.

I love the game. But seriously? You get 1 energy every 5 minutes and at minimum need 13 energy to get somewhere... Also why do you stop letting us watch ads? It gives you money and helps us in-game. Please add faster energy recharge and unlimited ads. Because taking away ads is a little much..

I'm done with this game... I have spent hours on it and despite being level 99 the game has stagnated. This latest update... Who the hell cares about a dog when you can't even keep a jacket for more than a trip to a location... Update has lost my account again and do you know... I think that I have had enough. I'll come back if you do ever finally release it which I don't think you will until you stop wasting time on pointless additions and concentrate on the core gameplay.sort yourselves out, I am going to find another game.

check out my review from yesterday and their reply. for an investment you can develop faster, which means spend money. that's all you care about. I've been a loyal player from the very beginning and that's their response. I'll post a message on Facebook everyday and see how many people keep playing your game or even start playing it. lol. isn't it funny how they only have gameplay graphics and controls that you can see the rating for and not how happy users are. download war z law of survival. that game is much better and the developers actually listen to the people playing.

There is no place left for friendship, love and compassion. A deadly plague virus pandemic has turned the world into a dead zone full of unkilled zombies. You can trust only yourself in this post apocalyptic game infected with walking dead zombies. Shoot and gunship zombies and other unkilled to survive in this post apocalypse game or they will kill you.JOIN A CLAN AND GUNSHIP ZOMBIES WITH FRIENDS!Shoot unkilled walking dead zombies with other game survivors - it’s an effective war strategy for this free zombie shooter rpg strategy game. It is easier to survive in this post apocalypse game and shoot the walking dead together with other survivors. So join clans and gunship zombies as much as you can! KEEP CALM AND CRAFT! SURVIVALCRAFT IS VITAL!Improve your game strategy and survivalcraft skills and create more deadly weapons against the unkilled walking dead zombies and enemies. Choose a target wisely and shoot zombies or pull a dead trigger in wildfowl to get some food. Keep away from the zombie frontier and gunship zombies to obtain resources.COMMUNICATE WITH OTHER PLAYERS!Use the chat. In this free post apocalypse mmorpg zombie survival game your own target is to craft more deadly weapons, shoot zombies and try to survive. Survivalcraft is vital for your strategy to survive in this post apocalypse game infected with plague virus and unkilled walking dead zombies. In 2027 an outbreak of an unknown plague virus infection wiped out most of the world’s population. The raging virus was named deadly plague infection. Meanwhile the pandemic of a new kind of plague virus carried away 80% of the population. Plague virus pandemic was turning them into hordes of the unkilled walking dead zombies.But the army of walking dead zombies is not your main problem. Many of those who were unkilled by the deadly plague virus will pull a dead trigger in your back. Stay alone or join clans to gunship zombies together.
